response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value to you, I estimate it's worth $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive and tailored to meet your specific needs, ensuring maximum efficiency and cost savings for your company. I look forward to discussing how this product can transform your business processes. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
